question: The thrill of creepy and eerie atmospheres excites me.
Immersing in worlds with magic and supernatural beings fascinates me.
I enjoy exploring unsolved mysteries or investigations.
Future technologies and space travel are intriguing concepts.
Past eras and historical events captivate my interest.
Simple language and child-friendly themes are enjoyable.
Stories focusing on young people's experiences and challenges are exciting.
Big questions about life and human existence intrigue me.
